text: Hussain Qasim (, born 21 September 1997) is a Saudi Arabian professional footballer who plays as a left back for Pro League side Al-Faisaly. ==Career== Hussain Qasim he started his career at the youth team of Al-Hilal. On 1 August 2018, Hussain Qasim left Al-Hilal and joined Pro League side Al-Ettifaq. On 14 September 2020, Hussain Qasim left Al-Ettifaq and joined Pro League side Al- Faisaly. ==References== == External links == * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Saudi Arabia youth international footballers Category:Al Hilal SFC players Category:Ettifaq FC players Category:Al-Faisaly FC players Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Association football fullbacks
title: Hussain Qassem
